Array: I-Is this the door? I dunno about this...
It looks pretty solid to me!
Charge into it
Back away
Geh!
I-Is this the door? I dunno about this...
It looks pretty solid to me!
Charge into it
Back away
Whoa!
Keep on recording and recording
After you die your face will warp and crumble
and be torn apart    on camera
The door leading inside is a malicious illusion.
Take heart and you can charge right through it.
No... NOOOOO!!
Gihh it baack!!
Gohhya!
Ghh! GHHAAH!!
Eye!
...! GhhhaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAGGGGHHH!!
Graaaaaaaaaahhhhhhh...!
HEEEEEELP MEEEEEE...!!
Uuuullllllgggghhh...
...*splut*
Doehhn't fit...
Ghh..hhhh...
Aaagh!
GEEEAAAHH!!
It seems almost like someone on the other side is
holding the door shut. No matter what, it just
won't open.
Heehee... Heeheehee...
Heehee... Heeheehee...
There's a door behind the cabinet, but it seems to
exist purely for show, as it's affixed to the wall
like a model. There's no way to open it.
There's nothing particularly useful in here.
Heehee... Heeheehee...
From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
Heehee... Heeheehee...
The hell's with these kids?! They won't get out of
our way!
I don't think we can get out this way as long as
they're around.
Maybe we can...I dunno, lure them away with
something?
You got anything on you that little kids might be
into? Anything at all?
This seemed to trigger an 'aha' moment for Ohkawa,
who began digging around inside his pocket with
purpose.
H-How about this?
A...bunny rabbit?
It's not a bunny rabbit! It's a rubber strap of
Sanctum from the 'Mach Girl Panzer' series!
How can you possibly not know that?!
Why WOULD I know that?! That show's for kids,
isn't it?
Everyone knows the best entertainment is just as
enjoyable for adults as it is for children! Plus,
the little guy's awfully cute, don't you think?
Place Sanctum as a lure?
Yes
No
...All right, let's see what happens...
The blue spirits began to gather around the rubber
strap.
Well, what do you know? They may be dead, but
they're still kids where it counts.
A-AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!
I don't think that's gonna do the trick. I work
at a convenience store, and I've never seen any
merchandise from this show in the kids' corner.
If I'm not mistaken, this kinda stuff is always
up front as part of the lottery drawings, where
it's mostly purchased by older men.
Yeah, that's where I got all my Panzer stuff from.
The Sanctum hair ornament is pretty much the
consolation prize of the batch.
So it's junk, then, even to little kids, and you're
just trying to unload it here!
Ack!
Almost as if in reaction to my statement, the
handheld gaming system flew from Ohkawa's pocket.
Crap! Hope it's okay...
Dude, if that thing is so valuable to you, you need
to be way more careful with it. You can't just
pocket it loose like that!
I didn't! It was deep in there! The thing just came
out on its own, like it wanted to be on the ground!
The blue spirits immediately began to draw near the
game system, obviously intrigued.
Wow. Guess we found our lure.
Dammit! Spoke too soon...
Huh...?
Woooow... Look at that!
What is it?
The system began to play of its own accord, show-
casing some high-end decision-making far beyond the
scope of mere casuals. The children were intrigued.
Heeheehee! This looks like fun!
More! Show us more!
Somebody's totally playing it. Ryosuke? Ryosuke,
is that you?!
If it is, we owe him one. Come on! Let's take this
opportunity and get the hell out of here!
B-But...!
Look, I know it's important to you and I understand,
but...Ryosuke is protecting us. He's giving us
what we need most right now: cover.
We have to make sure his efforts aren't wasted,
right?
Phew. Your friend really saved our asses.
Yeah...
...*sniffle*... Ry-Ryo...suke... Ryosuke...!
Come on. Don't cry.
But... But...! *sob*
Think of it this way: now you know for sure
that Ryosuke was by your side that whole time.
And even though you left your game system behind,
I'm sure he'll continue to protect you from the
shadows in other ways.
Because he's clearly...a really good friend...
Yeah... Yeah, you're right!
Good. So we have to survive in here, okay?
One way or another. For his sake.
Okay!
Crap, they're back. We gotta run! Come on!
Heehee... Heeheehee...
Heehee... Heeheehee...
How much longer     can you run
How much longer     can you stay together
How much longer     can you outwit death
Kishinuma, I think we should split up.
What? Why?!
If we just keep running together like this, they're
going to catch us sooner or later. We'll make one
tiny mistake, and that'll be the end of us!
Happens all the time in games. But I'm fast! I'll
be able to outrun them for sure. I just want you to
promise me that you'll keep on going too, okay?
Of course! Man, you sure did bounce back quick.
Haha. It's all thanks to you, buddy.
Don't get all sentimental on me, now. Get outta
here, before they catch up to us!
Okay. See you again real soon!
Damn. Already gone. He wasn't kidding -- he is
fast!
Gah! You again?!
And just where were you?
...! O-Ooooooooaaaahhhh...
When I call, you have to come right away.
Understand?
O-Oooaaagh...
Don't you talk back to me! I don't want to hear
any excuses from a blockhead like you. You want me
to rip out that tongue of yours?!
Aaagh! Oooahh...
*giggle* *gigglegiggle*
That's a good boy. Now, follow me.
O-Oaah... Ghh.
Ghh!
Oooooonng... Wh-Where...am I...?
Aaoohh, God, my head...is pounding...
And...fuck, I'm bleeding.
Dammit! What even happened?!
I remember I was trapped in some dimly lit room...
with a hammer-wielding maniac about to kill me...
and then...
...and...then...gah, I don't know! I can't remember
a damned thing!
(Though I feel like there was...someone else with
me. I think he...might've saved me.)
...! Goddamn, my head hurts. How long was I out for,
anyway? I need to find Shinozaki on the double!
Wait for me, Shinozaki! I'm coming!
(Don't think we'll be able to break through too
easily. We'll need to find another way around.)
(Those kid spirits will be hanging around here for
a while yet, most likely. Probably best to keep away
from here for the time being.)
*gasp* *wheeze*
O-Oaaaaggh...
Haaaa... Haaaaaah...!
The mysterious blackened zombie-like figure was
staring down at me, hammer raised above his head,
poised to strike me down at any moment.
His eyes were hollow and his cheeks were stained
with bloody tear tracks, adding exponentially to
his already menacing appearance.
(Crap. There's no way I'm going to survive this...)
I tried desperately to move my legs, but they just
wouldn't respond. It was as if the nerves had been
cut. I wasn't going anywhere.
I didn't know if it was because of the strike I'd
taken, or because I knew I was going to die...
...but I couldn't stop my legs from shaking or my
teeth from chattering, no matter what I did. It's
like I'd lost all control over my body.
(...! D-Dammit, move! Move! MOVE!!)
O-Oaaa-aaaaaaagh...
Phhhhhhhhaah...
(The hell? This guy get off on people's fear or
something?!)
God...dammit... Stop messing with me!
Oaagh? A-Aaahh...
...! Fuck's wrong with you? You gonna torture me
before you kill me?! Show off, like a big man?!
Oaaaagh...aaaagh... Aaagh?
Just...stop already! God!
(The hell is he doing?! I didn't live through all
the crap I've been through just to die in fear in
some dungeon!)
GOD...DAMMIT...LEGS...JUST...MOOOOOVE!!
Oooaah...?
MOVE! MOVE, MOVE, MOVEMOVEMOVE!!
Suddenly, the muscles that had frozen up on me
sprang to life in one glorious explosion of
movement. And in that moment...
Ooah...goooaaahh?
...Ghaah!
*pant* *pant* *pant*
(Well, I guess this means I live to see another
day, at least...)
Get up!
Wh-Who...are you?
Never mind that. We have to get out of here!
Can you stand?
Y-Yeah... Surprisingly, I can!
Well, then let's go, before he comes back.
Follow me! And try not to make too much noise.
Got it.
(I had no idea where this kid was taking me. It was
all a blur of narrow passageways, and I was just
blindly following them to...safety, I guess?)
(We just kept on running, through one dimly lit
corridor after another. There was no real sense of
direction, nor even of the distance we'd covered.)
*pant* *pant*
*pant* *pant*
We'll hide in that classroom!
Right!
...I think...we went far enough...to lose him.
Man. I really thought I was gonna die back there.
Don't know who you are, but you saved my life.
Thanks a bunch.
Oh... No, think nothing of it. It's just good
fortune that I got there when I did.
I heard something crash outside, and that did
a great job of distracting that...creature?
...Was that your doing?
Yeah.
Haha. Well, that's why I'm standing here now, safe
and sound. The name's Kishinuma. I'm an eleventh-
grader at a school called Kisaragi Academy.
O-Oh. I'm Tomohiro Ohkawa. I'm an eleventh-grader
too, at Byakudan Senior High School. It's nice to
meet you, Kishinuma.
Likewise.
Hmm? Are you...?
Huh? A-Am I what?!
Why are you avoiding looking at me?
Oh... Uh... Sorry. It's just that...well...
It's okay. Just say it.
...All right. There's a classmate of mine named
Shimada, and you...kind of have the same vibe
as him.
I do?
Yeah. But I...I don't want you to get the wrong
idea or anything! It's just kind of a conditioned
reflex for me to avoid his gaze. A habit, I guess.
I don't really understand. But, I mean, you just
saved my life! You're pretty much the cock of the
walk right now. So show some confidence!
Haha. Sorry.
Come on, seriously? All you've done since you
started talking is apologize!
Oh. Heh. Yeah, I guess I have. I'll have to...
work on that. So, Kishinuma, do you have any idea
why you were captured by that man?
None whatsoever. I was struck from behind, and when
I came to, I was in that room.
It was a hell of a strike, too. I mean...yeah,
dammit, my head is really swollen where he hit.
There's somebody I want to protect in here, too,
so if I'd met my end like that, I'd've been pissed.
I'd definitely be haunting this place by now.
Kishinuma...
Gotta say, though, I'm surprised to find someone
else I can talk to in here other than the people
I came with. Like, another human being.
Y-Yeah, me t-- Aagh!
Something wrong with your arm?
Yeah, I kind of...
Heeeeey! Sooooomebooooody! Aaaaanybooooody!
Hellooooooo? Aaaaaanybooooody theeeeere?!
If you're there, please aaaaansweeeeer! Heeeey!
...! Was that Kensuke?!
What's going on?
That voice! It was Kensuke's!
Kensuke?
Yeah, from my school. He's a friend who was brought
here with me. Upstairs!
Heeeeeeey! Aaaaaaaanbooooody?!
Saaaay soooomethiiiing!
Kensuke? Are you here?! Answer me, Kensuke!
Heeeeeeeey!
Where is that coming from? It's so loud and clear,
but there's nobody in sight...
Kensuke... KENSUKE!!
Okay, you need to calm down. If you're too loud,
that...thing is going to find us.
But I've been looking all over for him.
Kensuke! KEEEENSUKEEEE!!
Mitsuki! Fukuroi! Kizamiiii! Where did you all go?!
This is ridiculous. Why can't he hear me?!
Kensuke! I'm right here, Kensuke!
But it seemed pretty clear that this Kensuke person
couldn't hear him at all. Kensuke's cries gradually
receded into the distance.
Why? I'm right here... Ghh... Why are you leaving?!
Stooooop!
Is it because I...*sniffle*...because I ran off
without you? Is that why?!
Huh? Wait, what happened?
This is punishment. For deserting my friends.
For running away and leaving them behind.
Ohkawa...
I just...bolted. All by myself. With no regard for
my friends at all!
Ryosuke, Urabe, Kirisaki... I just left them all
to die! A-AaaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!
Ohkawa?! C-Calm down, Ohkawa! Seriously! Hey!
...Dammit all...
AAAAAAAAAGGGGGGHHHHH!! Khh... Ngggghhh...
ghhmmph!
Not sure what else to do, I put my hand over his
mouth to muffle him.
Dumbass! If you're that loud in a place this
exposed, that thing's gonna find us for sure!
...! Ghh... S-Sorr--
It's fine. Are...you all right?
I think so.
I just...promised I'd be there for him.
The two of us were always together, me and Ryosuke.
At school, in our free time...always. I'm so sorry,
Ryosuke. I'm so sorry...
(Always together, huh?)
It's the same for all of us in here, I think.
I mean, I've been separated from the person I'm
most concerned about, too.
You have?
Yeah. Every second I'm here is another second
I feel like crap for having left her behind.
But it won't do anyone any good to just keep dwell-
ing on the past. You gotta think about what needs to
be done from here on out.
A distinctly electronic sound was suddenly audible
from...somewhere.
The heck was that?
...Wait... Was that me?!
He proceeded to pull a handheld gaming system from
his pocket, which had clearly been powered on,
its LCD fully lit.
I know I turned this off. Why is it...?
The title screen of a rather pastel-looking game
was proudly displayed on the device.
'Love Miracle: Palpitation Revolution Plus'?
The heck is that?!
Oh, come on, you really don't know about it? It's
the biggest dating sim in the world right now. There
are even commercials for it! You haven't seen them?
Nope. Been so busy with work, I don't get the chance
to watch a lot of TV anymore.
No way... You can't be serious!
I don't give a crap, anyway. Just shut the thing
off. This is no time to be playing games.
Well, yeah, it's not, but still!
...Geeh! What's going on?! It's playing itself!
Huh?
How is this...even possible? ...I guess we are in
a place where ghosts are the norm, so it's not like
it's that shocking, but...it's still weird!
A game system that plays itself, huh?
Shinozaki would probably have a lot to say about
that. Spiritual manipulation, I think she called it.
Or, wait... She used a word that started with a P...
Poltergeist?
Yeah, that's it!
And that's exactly what it seemed to be, as the game
really was playing itself. The cursor was moving on
its own, picking choices and progressing the story.
This is Ms. Takanami's EX scenario, which Ryosuke
was really psyched to play through.
...Though he'll...never have the chance now.
Wait, don't tell me this Ryosuke guy...
...yeah. He's no longer...with us.
Damn...
His leg got cut clean off...and he was just gushing
blood. And turning colder and colder by the second.
He was so obviously dead...
But I couldn't bring myself to accept it. I didn't
WANT to accept it! And that's why Yuuya did what
he did. I finally get it.
Yuuya?
He was a friend of ours. But I called him a...
murderer. Before I ran off.
He kicked Ryosuke down the stairs. But only after
Ryosuke had already gone cold. Only after he'd...
already...
The hell'd he do that for? That's awful!
Yeah, it is. And I wasn't about to look past it.
How could I possibly let him get away with that?
I mean, even if Ryosuke was already dead, still...
...I wanted to live out my life with you, man.
I wanted us to play so many more games together.
I'm so sorry...I couldn't save you...
...Ryosuke... I'm so sorry...
(Guess he's kinda lost it a little. Can't say
I blame him, though.)
...Huh? It's gone back to the title screen.
That's odd.
Hey, Ohkawa? Have you considered that maybe, even
though you can't see him, Ryosuke is still right by
your side?
Huh? You think?!
I dunno, it's just a hunch, and it's probably little
consolation, but...maybe he's controlling that game
system. Maybe he's trying to tell you something.
Ryosuke...
Which would mean as long as you've got that thing
with you, you'll be able to play together anytime.
Kishinuma!
Ack! The hell's your problem, grabbing someone
like that?!
I'm hugging you, Kishinuma! I don't care if you're
just placating me or what... Thank you. It makes me
really happy to think that Ryosuke's still with me!
N-No problem...
I'm so glad I met you, Kishinuma!
A-All right, already! Just get off of me!
You're snotting me up something fierce!
*sniffle* I don't want to see anybody else die.
We should make sure we get out of here alive,
Kishinuma! Promise me we will!
Well, I mean, that's certainly the plan! I want
to get the hell out of this awful place as soon
as humanly possible.
That's why we gotta keep trying to find other
people in here. Other LIVING people. So we can
all get the hell out together.
That sounds perfect!
Fhooooound hyooooo...
Dammit, we gotta get moving!
C-Come on!
